songs.title: Applause - Come To Mama - Edge Of Glory - Born This Way (ACT IV)
songs.lyrics:
*Lick 2 fingers*

[Verse 1]
I stand here waiting for you to bang the gong!
To crash the critic saying, "is it right or is it wrong?"
If only fame had an IV
Baby, could I bear being away from you
I found the vein, put it in here

[Pre-Chorus]
*claps hands* I live for the applause, applause, applause, I live for the applause-plause live for the applause-plause live for the
Live for the way you cheer and SCREAM FOR ME!

The applause, applause, applause

[Chorus]
Give me that thing that I love
Put your hands up, make 'em touch
Give me that thing that I love
Put your hands up, make 'em touch

[Post-Chorus]
A-P-P-L-A-U-S-E
Put your hands up, make 'em touch, touch
A-P-P-L-A-U-S-E
Put your hands up, make 'em touch, touch

[Verse 2]
I've overheard your theory "Nostalgia's for geeks"
I guess sir, if you say so
Some of us just like to read
One second I'm a kunst, then suddenly the kunst is me
Pop culture was in art, now art’s in pop culture, in me

[Pre-Chorus]
I live for the applause, applause, applause
I live for the applause-plause, live for the applause-plause
Live for the way you cheer and SCREAM FOR MEEE-EH!


The applause, applause, applause

[Chorus]
Give me that thing that I love
Put your hands up, make 'em touch
Give me that thing that I love
Put your hands up, make 'em touch

[Post-Chorus]
A-P-P-L-A-U-S-E
Put your hands up, make 'em touch, touch
A-P-P-L-A-U-S-E
Put your hands up, make 'em touch, touch
[Bridge]
Woo...
Touch, touch
Woo...
I want your hands up
I want you to clap for yourself!
Cheer for each other! Because you are all superstars!


[Pre-Chorus]
I live for the applause, applause, applause
I live for the applause-plause, live for the applause-plause
Live for the way you cheer and scream for me
The applause, applause, applause

[Chorus]
GIVE ME THAT THING THAT I LOVE!

PUT YOUR HANDS UP, ! MAKE ‘EM TOUCH

Give me that thing that I love (I'll turn the lights out)
Put your hands up, make 'em touch, LOU-OH-UD! OH!


[Post-Chorus]
A-P-P-L-A-U-S-E (make it real loud)
Put your hands up, make 'em touch, touch
A-P-P-L-A-U-S-E (make it real loud)
Put your hands up, make
Touch, touch! *does hand movement*

-CTM-`

Hello Roblox!
Okay I wanna know something: How many of you are a member of the LGBTQ community tonight?
Oh that’s quite a lot!

And how many of you are not members of that community?
Okay! That’s right people. That’s good because we like everybody here

‘Cause you know. We all just gotta l*ve each other
The way things are going we just have to give l*ve to all our sisters and all our brothers, ‘cause man
It wasn’t that long ago, we were all just living in the jungle

*sings* So why do we gotta, put each other down, when there’s more than enough love, to g-g-go around!

So, if you’re confused about equality, or you, huh, wanna ask some questions, just come to mama, I’ll tell you everything!

Listen up! *plays piano*

[Verse 1]
Everybody's got to love each other
Stop throwin' stones at your sisters and your brothers
Man, it wasn't that long ago we were all living in the jungle!
So why do we gotta put each other down
When there's more than enough love to g-g-go around?

[Chorus]
Come to mama, tell me who hxrt ya
There’s gonna be no future, if we don’t figure this out!

[Verse 2]
Dude in a lab coat and a man of God
*smiles*
Fought over prisms and a forty-day flood!
Come onto mama!
Well, I say rainbows did more than they've ever done!
So why do we gotta fight over ideas?
We're talkin' the same old shit after all of these years

[Chorus]
Come to mama, tell me who hxrt ya
There’s gonna be no future, if we don’t figure this out!
Oh, come tomorrow!
Who are you gonna follow?
There’s gonna be no future, if we don’t figure this out!
-
Thanks for all your gifts and all your love

[Verse 3]
Psychic guru catches minnows in the harbor
Come onto mama, come on, mama
Everyone tells him he should work a little harder
Hey man, get to work! Catch up!
They all tell you that freedom must be bought
But baby, he's already caught 'em
Why do we gotta, tell each other how to live?
The only prisons that exist are ones we put each other in!
Ah-eh-ah-eh!
HANDS UP CMON !
[Chorus]
Come to mama, tell me who hxrt ya
There’s gonna be no future, if we don’t figure this out, ooh
OH-oh, come tomorrow!
Who are you gonna follo-oh-ow!
There’s gonna be no future, if we don’t figure this out!

[Outro]
COME TO MAMA!
COME ONTO ME, OH OH OH OH OH
COME ONTO MAMA, COME TO MAMA
Come on mama
OH OH OH OH
OH OH OH OH
OH-UH

Woohoo-hoo woohoo hoo-oo-hoo
'Cause I wanna be there
I wanna be there, I wanna be there for you! I wanna be there!

Why do we gotta, tell each other how to live, the only prisons that exist are ones we put each other in
Why do we gotta tell each other how to live?
Look what the rainbow did!
*poses*

-The Edge Of Glory-

*plays piano*

[Verse 1]
There ain’t no reason you and me should be alone tonight yeah baby
But I got a reason that you-hoo should take me home tonight, umh, umh..
I need a man that thinks it right when it's so wrong, tonight yeah baby
Right on the limit's where we know we both belong, tonight, Alright, alright…

[Pre-Chorus]
‘Cause it’s time to feel the rush, to push the dangerous…
I’m gonna run right to, to the edge with you
Where we can both fall, far in lxve-oh!

[Chorus]
I’m on the edge, of glory, and I’m hanging on a moment of truth
I’m on the edge, of glory, and I’m hanging this moment right there with you
When you don’t know what to do you practise one more time
I'm on the edge
The edge, the edge, the edge
I'm on the edge of glory
And I'm hangin' on a moment
I'm on the edge with you
All I can tell you is, if you have a light that shines bright, at some point, somebody’s gonna see you
I’m on the edge-eh, with you. *plays piano*
I’M ON THE EDGE WITH YOU-UH!
I’m on the edge, Oh roblox, I’ll be right there, with you… *plays piano*

-btw-
*put arms up*
Come on, put your paws up! Let me feel your pride!

This is how we do it! Let’s sing it Roblox, come on! Let’s go! *grab skirt*


[Verse 1]
My mama told me when I was young, we are all born superstars
She rolled my hair and put my lipstick on
In the glass of her boudoir *take dancer hand*
"There's nothing wrong with loving who you are"
She said, "'Cause he made you perfect, babe"
"So hold your head up, girl, and you'll go far *poses*
Listen to me when I say!"
Cmon lets go !

[Chorus]
I'm beautiful in my way *daces*
'Cause God makes no mistakes
I'm on the right track, baby
I was born this way *spin*
Don't hide yourself in regret
Just love yourself, and you're set
I'm on the right track, baby
I was born this way *flip hair*

[Post-Chorus]
Ooh, there ain't no other way
Baby, I was born this way!
Baby, I was born this way *flip hair*
Ooh, there ain't no other way
I see you over there !

[Interlude]
Don't be a drag, just be a queen
Don't be a drag, just be a queen
Don't be a drag, just be a queen!
*shake hair*

[Verse 2]
Give yourself prudence and love your friends
Subway kid, rejoice your truth *waves*
In the religion of the insecure
I must be myself, respect my youth. *does arms movements*
A different lover is not a sin
Believe capital H-I-M!
Hey, hey, hey
I love my life, I love this record and
Mi amore vole fe yah. *shake hair*

[Chorus]
I'm beautiful in my way
'Cause God makes no mistakes! *point*
I'm on the right track, baby *dances*
I was born this way
Don't hide yourself in regret
Just love yourself, and you're set
I'm on the right track, baby
I was born this way !

[Post-Chorus]
There ain't no other way !
Baby, I was born this way
Baby, I was born this way!
*dances*
Im on the right track, baby
I was born this way

[Breakdown]
Don't be a drag, just be a queen, whether you're broke or evergreen. *touch hair*
You're black, white, beige, cholo descent, you're Lebanese, you're orient
Whether life's disabilities, left you outcast, bullied, or teased
Rejoice and love yourself today, sing it with me !


[Bridge]
No matter gay, straight or bi, lesbian, transgendered life, I’m on the right track baby I was born to survive, no matter black, white, or beige, chxla or orient made, I’m on the right track, baby I was born to be brave!


[Chorus]
I'm beautiful in my way *take skirt*
'Cause God makes no mistakes *waves*
I'm on the right track, baby
I was born this way
Don't hide yourself in regret
Just love yourself, and you're set
I'm on the right track, baby !
I was born this way, yeah

[Post-Chorus]
Ooh, there ain't no other way! *take dancer hand*
Baby, I was born this way!
Ooh, there ain't no other way
Baby, I was born this way
Right track, baby
I was born this way

[Outro]
I was born this way, hey!
I was born this way, hey!
Hey what you said ? *point*
I was born this way eh !
I was born this way, hey
I was born this way, hey
I'm on the right track, baby
I was born this way-hey! *hugs dancer*

:unlight
